basics.name: Information Technology Consultant
basics.label: Information Technology Consultant
basics.summary: Proficient in Software and Hardware management, with significant experience in computer network setup, computer repair and upgrade, and Microsoft Excel spreadsheet creation. Exhibits excellent organizational and interpersonal capabilities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Engaged in setting up basic computer networks, software and printer installations, and computer repair and upgrade for individuals. Skilled in creating type of Microsoft Excel spreadsheets.
highlights: Setup network for small non-profit organization
Created organizational spreadsheets for daily operations and marketing for small businesses
Upgraded SQL and Time Matters for Edward S.Clay, P.A.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for administrative functions as well as billing assistance in UCAP (internal billing system). Order and shipping duties included alongside airtime report preparation.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Led activities involving asset re-titling, data entry, client relationship management, and supplying. Additional responsibilities included legal document review, verifying client signatures, and troubleshooting
highlights: Developed strong working relationships with trust maintenance clients
Managed a 73% growth in client base during employment period
Managed probate process for various estates concurrently while overseeing funding for new and existing clients

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Engaged in student report preparation for multiple state regulatory agencies and national accreditation agency, ACCET. Also, managed course scheduling, student records, and complaints.
highlights: Saved company over $4 million by strengthening textbook inventory controls
Introduced system of student records collection and storage through collaboration with programmers
Managed class schedules across all 25 schools

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Installed and troubleshooted Windows 2000 workstations, hardware, printers, peripherals, and software. Oversaw telecommunication system administration and trained brokers and new employees. Responsibly processed stock certificates and checks for deposit and accurately maintained client accounts.
highlights: Promoted to IT Coordinator from Operations Manager

skills.name: Technical
keywords: MS Office Suite (Word, Outlook, PowerPoint, Excel, Access, CRM)

skills.name: Hardware
keywords: Build, Repair, and Upgrade Desktop Computers
Install and Setup Servers, Printers, and Routers
